responsiveNotes.pattern: ~20-30% size reduction from desktop to mobile

icons.bipos: Icon position: '' (before text) or '1' (after text) - CSS flexbox order
icons.bispac: Icon spacing from text (column-gap) - responsive object
icons.biSize: Icon size: font-size for FA, max-width for images - responsive

typography.tShadow: Text shadow object (openShadow, horizontal, vertical, blur, color)

borderAndRadius.bBord: Border object (openBorder, type, width, color) - normal state
borderAndRadius.brad: Border radius - responsive object with top/bottom/left/right

spacing.btPad: Button padding - responsive object with top/bottom/left/right
spacing.btshadow: Box shadow object (openShadow, horizontal, vertical, blur, spread, color)

positioning.glohoriOffset: Horizontal offset for absolute/fixed (right: X) - responsive
positioning.gloverticalOffset: Vertical offset for absolute/fixed (bottom: X) - responsive

validationRules.btxt: Required - Button text (can be empty for icon-only buttons)
validationRules.bLink.url: Required - At minimum set to '#' for no-op buttons
validationRules.biType: When using icons, must be 'fontAwesome' or 'image' (not 'none')
validationRules.bImg: Required when biType='image' (must have url property)
validationRules.bTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable typography settings
validationRules.tShadow.openShadow: Must be 1 to enable text shadow
validationRules.btshadow.openShadow: Must be 1 to enable box shadow

warnings: Button with no text (btxt='') and no icon creates invisible button (ensure icon is set)
target='_blank' without rel='noopener noreferrer' has security risks (WordPress adds automatically)
Fixed positioning (globalPosition='fixed') removes button from document flow
Icon-only buttons should have aria-label for accessibility (not available in this block)
Very large padding on mobile (>20px top/bottom) may create oversized buttons
Gradient backgrounds don't support hover gradients - use solid hover color instead
bipos value is CSS order (empty or '1') - other values may break layout
nofollow links won't pass SEO value - only use for untrusted/paid links
Circular buttons (brad: 50%) require equal width/height - use equal padding
commonMistakes: Setting biType='fontAwesome' but forgetting to set bIcon class name
Using bipos='left' or 'right' (should be '' or '1' for flexbox order)
Forgetting to set openBg: 1 before setting background color
Setting target='_blank' for internal links (use only for external)
Not setting responsive padding (btPad) - creates oversized mobile buttons
Using brad with only one value instead of top/bottom/left/right object
Setting very large bispac (icon spacing >20px) creating excessive gap
Forgetting to set hover colors (bthColor, bthBg) for interactive feedback
Using absolute/fixed positioning without understanding offset behavior
bestPractices: Use descriptive button text (avoid 'Click Here' - use 'Download PDF', 'Sign Up Free')
Set target='_blank' and nofollow='nofollow' for external links
Always define hover states (bthColor, bthBg) for visual feedback
Use 5-8px border radius for modern look, 25-50px for pill/rounded buttons
Icon spacing (bispac): 8-12px is optimal for readability
For icon-only buttons, use circular shape (brad: 50px, equal padding)
Set responsive padding (reduce 20-30% on mobile) to avoid oversized buttons
Use semantic colors: green for success, red for danger, blue for info
Limit gradient angles to 135deg or 90deg for clean appearance
For FAB buttons, use fixed positioning with 20-30px offsets
accessibilityNotes: Button text (btxt) provides accessible label - keep descriptive and clear
Icon-only buttons lack accessible labels (use Pro version for aria-label support)
Ensure sufficient color contrast: WCAG AA requires 4.5:1 for text
Button should have visible focus state for keyboard navigation
Use target='_blank' sparingly - notify users link opens new tab
Don't rely solely on color for button states - add border/shadow changes
Button text should describe action ('Download PDF', not 'Click Here')
performanceConsiderations: Button blocks are lightweight - minimal DOM overhead
FontAwesome icons require Font Awesome library loaded
Gradient backgrounds use GPU compositing - hardware accelerated
Fixed positioning triggers new stacking context
Image icons (biType='image') require HTTP request for each image
Hover effects use CSS transitions - no JavaScript cost
Shadow effects (btshadow, tShadow) may impact rendering performance if excessive

problemsAndSolutions.solution: Check biType='fontAwesome' and bIcon has valid FA class (e.g., 'fas fa-star'). Ensure Font Awesome is loaded.
Set btBg.openBg: 1 and btBg.bgType: 'color' with btBg.bgDefaultColor: '#yourcolor'
Set hover attributes: bthColor for text, bthBg.openBg: 1 with bthBg.bgDefaultColor for background
Set responsive padding: btPad.xs with smaller values (e.g., {top: 12, bottom: 12, left: 25, right: 25})

problemsAndSolutions.problem: Icon and text have no gap
problemsAndSolutions.solution: Set bispac: {md: '10', unit: 'px'} for 10px spacing between icon and text
Ensure equal padding (top=bottom=left=right) and brad all sides set to 50px or higher
globalPosition='fixed' uses right/bottom offsets. glohoriOffset is right: X, gloverticalOffset is bottom: X
